abstract: Matthew E. Zames, the JPMorgan executive who was tapped on Monday to replace the outgoing chief investment officer, Ina Drew, announced several top leadership changes in the unit on Monday afternoon.
snippet: Matthew E. Zames, the JPMorgan executive who was tapped on Monday to replace the outgoing chief investment officer, Ina Drew, announced several top leadership changes in the unit on Monday afternoon.
lead_paragraph: Several days after announcing a $2 billion loss in its chief investment office, JPMorgan Chase is clearing house.

headline.main: After $2 Billion Loss, JPMorgan Reshuffles Trading Group
